    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Method called whenever the compiler is invoked. Supplies the needed information for compiling the given files.
        Parameters:
        args - The String array containing the locations of the files to compile, as well as other compiler arguments.

      • log

        public void log(java.lang.String message)
        Output the log message from the compiler.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing what happened.

      • log

        public static void log(long flags,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Output the log message from the compiler.
        Parameters:
        flags - The flags that verify whether the compiler is verbose.
        message - The message describing what happened.

      • warning

        public void warning(java.lang.String message)
        Output a warning message from the compiler.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the warning.

      • error

        public void error(java.lang.String message)
        Output an error message from the compiler.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the error.

      • containsErrors

        public boolean containsErrors()
        Get whether or not the compilation has accumulated any errors.
        Returns:
        Whether or not there are any errors currently.

      • addExternalImport

        public void addExternalImport(FileDeclaration file,
                              java.lang.String location)
        Add the given external import location to be added to the compilation list.
        Parameters:
        file - The File that is importing the location.
        location - The location that is being imported.

      • isFlagEnabled

        public boolean isFlagEnabled(long flag)
        Check if the specific flag is enabled for the compiler.
        Parameters:
        flag - The flag to check if is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the flag is enabled.

      • isFlagEnabled

        public static boolean isFlagEnabled(long flags,
                                    long flag)
        Check if the specific flag is enabled for the given set of flags.
        Parameters:
        flags - The flags to verify the flag with.
        flag - The flag to check if is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the flag is enabled.
